Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 66th overall pick, by Bay City in 1977...
Injured on 5/22/1983 with a Tender Shoulder, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 4/2/1984, off James Pressnell (PIT)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/3/1984, off Robert Solis (PIT)...
Won World Championship with Bay City in 1984...
Traded from Bay City to New Jersey on 7/23/1986 (Going to BC: CF J. Baugh. Going to NJ: 3B B. Thompson, P J. Diez, 3B D. Gardner)...
Traded from New Jersey to Malibu on 3/1/1988 (Going to Mal: 3B B. Thompson. Going to NJ: P R. Maddocks, P J. Preston)...
